text: The 1945 New York Giants season was the franchise's 63rd season. The team finished in fifth place in the National League with a 78-74 record, 19 games behind the Chicago Cubs. == Offseason == * Prior to 1945 season: Ed Albrecht was signed as an amateur free agent by the Giants.Ed Albrecht page at Baseball Reference == Regular season == === Season standings === === Record vs. opponents === === Opening Day lineup === === Roster === {| class="toccolours" style="font-size: 95%;" |- !
